plist.dict:
Label sh.construct.daemon.{{ .Name }}
ProgramArguments
{{ .ExecPath }}
Sockets
Listeners
SockPathName /tmp/construct-{{ .Name }}.sock SockType stream
KeepAlive <{{ .KeepAlive }} />
ExitTimeOut 60
StandardOutPath /var/log/construct-{{ .Name }}.out StandardErrorPath /var/log/construct-{{ .Name }}.err
